titleStmt.title: The Articles of Exeter made on the rendition thereof : with the vote of the Honourable House of Commons in the approbation of them of the 6 of May, 1646 : with the order and ordinance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled for the approbation, publication, and observation of them by all committees, judges, and officers, aud [sic] others concerned in them of the 4 of this instant Novemb, 1647.
titleStmt.author: Exeter (England)

titleStmt.title: The Articles of Exeter made on the rendition thereof : with the vote of the Honourable House of Commons in the approbation of them of the 6 of May, 1646 : with the order and ordinance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled for the approbation, publication, and observation of them by all committees, judges, and officers, aud [sic] others concerned in them of the 4 of this instant Novemb, 1647.
titleStmt.author: Exeter (England)
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Berkeley, John, Sir, d. 1678.

notesStmt.note: "The articles made and agreed upon between Sir Thomas Fairfax, Generall, and Sir Iohn Berkley, Governour of Exeter ... "-- P. [1].
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
